text: John Evans Fiifi Atta Mills (21 July 1944 â€“ 24 July 2012) was a Ghanaian politician, a lawyer, a legal scholar, a tax expert and a sports administrator. He became President of Ghana after he was elected in 2009. He died on 24 July 2012 from throat cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1944 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Presidents of Ghana Category:Sports executives and administrators Category:Vice presidents of Ghana
